After just 3 weeks of using this app, we guarantee that you will be fitter, stronger and healthier than you have ever been. reviews.title: Doesn\'t open on my note 2 or galaxy s3
reviews.comment: Force Closes. The app never starts. my screen just goes black for few seconds and then and error message comes up.
